snippet: Representative Edward J. Markey, Democrat of Massachusetts, said he would introduce a bill on Friday requiring that compounding pharmacies that produce on a large scale be regulated by the Food and Drug Administration.
abstract: Rep Edward J Markey, Democrat of Massachusetts, says he will introduce bill requiring that compounding pharmacies that produce on large scale be regulated by Food and Drug Administration as drug manufacturers and that compounded drugs be labeled as such; move comes after deadly meningitis outbreak was traced to contaminated injectable steroid made by New England Compounding Center in Framingham, Mass.
lead_paragraph: Representative Edward J. Markey, Democrat of Massachusetts, said he would introduce a bill on Friday requiring that compounding pharmacies that produce on a large scale be regulated by the Food and Drug Administration.
